content: The power of the god cannot be overcome. - Zamza, this is the providence of the world. Even gods are merely being restricted to the limited power determined by propaganda powers, although great is not unlimited. - That voice! - Our best! How dare you disobey me? I am Monadda, I was here at the beginning and I will proclaim the end. Rebecca, that's impossible. - Drunk, it is time for you to choose does this world belong to Zamza or does it belong to you? That is something I decided long ago. We use our power to fell a god and then these are destiny! - It's fading the memory of a godly existence born from the chaos of creation.
